Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 55th overall pick, by Montreal in 2016...
Injured on 7/24/2017 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/10/2017...
Injured on 7/7/2019 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2019, going 2-0, 1.17...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,621,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,621,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Montreal to Cincinnati on 2/4/2023 (Going to CIN: P Donnie Kopp, CF James Ostrowski, P Philip Lund, CF Hector Huerta, 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: P Matthew Gordillo, RF Patricio
Garza, 1B Manuel Cambra, RF Troy Burrier)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2023, off Robert Gonzalez (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/2023, off Emanuel Pardo (NY)...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/8/2024 to a 6-year deal worth $4,760,000 per year...
